description: Casts a Fireball that explodes on impact in a 3 foot sphere
name: Fireball

description: Fires 3 glowing missles that track its target. Under typical conditions, this spell can't miss.
name: Magic Missle

description: Heals any creature you touch for 1d8 hitpoints
name: Cure Wounds

description: A bolt of lightning streaks out in a direction you choose.
name: Lightning Bolt

description: Any creature you touch gains a protective layer of armor (Defense 12) until the spell ends. If the creature's Defense is already above this amount, this spell does nothing and no mana is spent.
name: Magical Armor

description: For the duration of this spell, you can sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.
name: Detect Magic

description: A creature of your choice that you can see regains 1d4 hitpoints
name: Healing Word

description: A creature that you touch must make a 12 DC Endurance saving throw. If it fails, the creature falls into a deep sleep for the duration of the spell. If the target is damaged in any way, they will awaken.
name: Sleep
per_level_increase: 20 Mana for 1 extra point for Endurance DC, or 20 Mana for 1 extra minute

description: A creature that you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. This affects anything the creature is currently wearing. Any invisible item removed during the duration of the spell will become visible again
name: Invisibility

description: A bolt of frost streaks out in a direction you choose
name: Frost Bolt
upgrades: AL 10: Another bolt is shot for no extra cost

description: Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's maximum hitpoints and current hitpoints increase by 5 for the duration
name: Aid

description: Shoots a ball of acid in a direction of your choice. If this ball hits an object, any creature within line of fire in a 6 feet cone must make a 12 DC Athletics saving throw or take damage.
name: Acid Splash
upgrades: AL 10: Friendly targets of your choice are unaffected by this spell
